name: EmailWish
author: EmailWish

sections.description:
EmailWish is an email marketing solution designed for ecommerce, offering powerful automation tools to drive the growth of businesses of every size. This plugin enables you to seamlessly sync your WooCommerce sales, products, and customers with EmailWish. With EmailWish, you can set up interactive chats, attention-grabbing popups, customer reviews, and personalized emails, including abandoned cart recovery emails. Effortlessly collect emails for your newsletter and unlock the full potential of your business.

Usage

Once EmailWish is installed and connected to your WooCommerce store, it will automatically sync your sales, products, and customers with EmailWish. You can then utilize the various automation tools and features available in EmailWish to grow your business effectively. Set up engaging chats to interact with customers, create attention-grabbing popups to capture leads, encourage customer reviews to boost credibility, and leverage personalized emails, including abandoned cart recovery emails, to drive conversions. Use the EmailWish dashboard to monitor and analyze your email marketing campaigns for better insights.

License

This plugin is licensed under the GNU General Public License (GPL) version 2.0 or later. You can find the full text of the license here.

Contact and Support

For any support or inquiries, please email us at support@emailwish.com or visit our website at http://www.emailwish.com.
sections.installation:
There are two ways to install the EmailWish plugin:

  1. From WordPress Plugins:

    • Go to your WordPress admin dashboard.
    • Navigate to ‘Plugins’ -> ‘Add New’.
    • Search for ‘EmailWish’.
    • Click ‘Install Now’ next to the ‘EmailWish’ plugin.
    • Once installed, click ‘Activate’ to activate the plugin.

  2. Manual Installation:

    • Download the plugin ZIP file from the EmailWish website.
    • Extract the ZIP file on your computer.
    • Upload the extracted ’emailwish’ folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory.
    • Log in to your WordPress admin dashboard.
    • Navigate to the ‘Plugins’ page.
    • Locate ‘EmailWish’ in the list of plugins.
    • Click ‘Activate’ to activate the plugin.
sections.faq:
Q: What is EmailWish?
A: EmailWish is an email marketing solution designed specifically for ecommerce businesses. It offers powerful automation tools and features to help businesses of all sizes grow and succeed.

Q: Does EmailWish support WooCommerce?
A: Yes, EmailWish seamlessly integrates with WooCommerce. It automatically syncs your sales, products, and customers, allowing you to leverage the full potential of EmailWish’s features within your WooCommerce store.

Q: What type of automation tools does EmailWish provide?
A: EmailWish offers various automation tools, including interactive chats, attention-grabbing popups, customer reviews, personalized emails, and abandoned cart recovery emails. These tools help you engage customers, capture leads, improve credibility, and drive conversions.
